## SortedMapOpts interface

SortedMapOpts implementation config settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SortedMapOpts<K> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [capacity](./associative.sortedmapopts.capacity.md) | <code>number</code> | Initial capacity before resizing (doubling) occurs. This value will be rounded up to next pow2. |
|  [compare](./associative.sortedmapopts.compare.md) | <code>Comparator&lt;K&gt;</code> | Key comparison function. Must follow standard comparator contract and return: - negative if <code>a &lt; b</code> - positive if <code>a &gt; b</code> - <code>0</code> if <code>a == b</code>Note: The [SortedMap](./associative.sortedmap.md) implementation only uses <code>&lt;</code> and <code>==</code> style comparisons. |
|  [probability](./associative.sortedmapopts.probability.md) | <code>number</code> | Probability for a value to exist in any express lane of the underlying Skip List implementation. |
